name: Snake Battles [WIP]
description:
A spin on the classic snake game. Play with a friend and battle in a competition for food!

Please remember that this is a WIP/indev game. If you have suggestions or noticed any glitches, please tell me in the comments section

Controls:

WASD+CTRL (Player 1: Top right)

ARROW KEYS + NUM 0 (Player 2: Bottom Left)

I'd recommend reading the "HELP" section in the level editor before playing because some of the levels are a bit more complex. Read it by clicking the "HELP" button in Level Editor.

To add your levels into the level pool, go to the INDEX and add your level name.

Please provide feedback if you checked it out!
